select sa.id, sa.article_name, sa.article_img_url, sa.article_intro_url, sa.article_content_url, sa.create_by, sa.create_time, sa.last_update_by, sa.last_update_time, sa.del_flag from sys_article sa
inner join sys_dept_article sda on sda.dept_id = #{deptId} and sa.id = sda.article_id
inner join sys_type_article sta on sta.type_id = #{typeId} and sa.id = sta.article_id
inner join sys_user_article sua on sua.user_id = #{userId} and sua.article_id = sa.id
